    • Method Detail

      • compareEps

        public static int compareEps(double a,
             double b)
        Compares two doubles. Two numbers are close if their absolute difference is less or equal than the value of EPS
        Parameters:
        a - first double to compare
        b - second double to compare
        Returns:
        the value 0 if a is close to b; a value less than 0 if a is less than b ; a value greater than 0 if a is greater than b

      • makeSection

        public static java.util.Set<Segment4d> makeSection(Plane4d plane,
                                   Cube4d cube)
        Returns section edges as 4d segments
        Parameters:
        plane - section plane
        cube - section cube
        Returns:
        set of 4d segments
